ComicInfo.Summary:
Want to read some great all ages comics? Don't wait for Mr. Peabody to tell you, check out The Rocky & Bullwinkle Show #3! Its chock-full'a intelligent and clever stories that amuse, entertain, and tickle your funny bone. Remember when cartoons were smart and satirical? Join Moose and Squirrel on a way-back trip to a slapstickier era! Now, come watch us pull a rabbit out of this hat! The Rocky & Bullwinkle Show comes with three covers - Main & Peabody & Sherman Covers by Adrian Ropp and a Retro Animation Retailer Incentive Edition.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Main Cover | Adrian Ropp | 1 | Var | Mr. Peabody & Sherman Variant Cover | Adrian Ropp | 2 | RI | Retailer Incentive Retro Animation Cover | Animation | 3 | Note: The digital edition (8/29/2018) for this issue was released before the print edition.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-14 00:13:06. [CVDB682628]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Adrian Ropp, Al Kilgore, Jacob Greenawalt
ComicInfo.Characters: Boris Badenov, Bullwinkle, Dudley Do-Right, Fearless Leader, Inspector Fenwick, Natasha Fatale, Nell Fenwick, Peabody, Rocky, Sherman, Sir Francis Drake, Snidely Whiplash
ComicInfo.Teams: Boris and Natasha, Bullwinkle and Rocky
